content.rendered: This template allows you to set in admin the min and maxim values for lot size, property size, rooms, bedrooms and bathrooms. The rest of the elements will be synced with your property categories, types, cities, areas and states added in admin. Property status syncs with the status list you add in theme options. Features and amenities sync with the features you select to show in Advanced search which you custom add in theme options too.
